meta.job_title: Local Class A CDL Truck Driver

duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive late model, Penske Truck Leasing trucks to deliver automobile parts to car dealerships on a dedicated route, Monday through Friday.
Adhere to federal and/or state laws, regulations, and/or agency rules, standards, and guidelines while ensuring regular, predictable, and full attendance.
Operate the vehicle and cargo area safely, with the ability to lift and move up to 50lbs/23kg and occasionally up to 100lbs/45kg.

education_certification.credential: Commercial Driver's License (CDL) Class A required
